title: event.startDate
description:
The date & time that the [event](./event.json) or [subEvent](./event-subEvent.json) starts, as an ISO-8601 date. For example `2021-05-17T22:00:00+00:00`.

Required on events when using one of the following calendarTypes:

- `single`
- `multiple`
- `periodic`

Always required on subEvents.
